scripts.dev: RUNE_ENV=local RS_PORT=7832 RS_SSL_PORT=7833 GS_PORT=7842 GS_SSL_PORT=7843 PROVIDER_URI=wss://autumn-blue-meadow.bsc.quiknode.pro/6b0e7864e252135989a5346630683db90691012a/ LOG=1 LOG_PREFIX=[RERS] tsnd --respawn -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/index.ts
scripts.inspect: NODE_ENV=development yarn build && PORT=3001 NODE_ENV=production node --inspect build/index.js
scripts.start: RS_PORT=7080 RS_SSL_PORT=7443 GS_PORT=8080 GS_SSL_PORT=8443 PROVIDER_URI=wss://autumn-blue-meadow.bsc.quiknode.pro/6b0e7864e252135989a5346630683db90691012a/ LOG=1 LOG_PREFIX=[RERS] NODE_ENV=production node -r tsconfig-paths/register --max_semi_space_size=30000 --max-old-space-size=30000 --initial-old-space-size=8000 --optimize-for-size --experimental-modules --experimental-json-modules build/src/index.js
scripts.forever: NODE_ENV=production yarn build && sudo nohup forever start forever-config.json &
scripts.release: NODE_ENV=production tsc && gcloud app deploy app.yaml --project evident-ethos-317302
scripts.killkill: sudo kill -9 `ps -aux | grep /usr/bin/node | grep -v grep | awk '{ print $2 }'` && sudo kill -9 `ps -aux | grep RuneInfinite | grep -v grep | awk '{ print $2 }'`
